explains: n. 精神病学家，精神科医生

sentences.en: He filched pills from the psychiatrist.
sentences.cn: 他从精神科医生那里偷拿了一些药片。

sentences.en: One forensic psychiatrist described him as having an incurable antisocial personality disorder.
sentences.cn: 一位法庭精神病医生将他描述为患有不可治愈反社会人格障碍。

sentences.en: She'd better see a psychiatrist at the consoling center.
sentences.cn: 她最好去心理咨询中心看精神病医生。
